response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $8,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $7,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 7500}
